title: Please fix ur bug riot...
body:
Sometimes when the accept game window pop out, if u click accept, it will freeze there and u can't choose champion or do anything, you can only watch urself dodge the game and result in 5 min or even 15 min waiting for dodging a game. 
IMAGING WHEN THIS HAPPEN TO YOUR PROMO.
